meta.title: Memories of Mechanicsville
meta.subtitle: Story of the river and its gorge
meta.author: Meranda Gallupe-Paton
meta.description: Testing out Mural for a potential sound and photo project.

imagebackground.title: Memories of Mechanicsville
imagebackground.subtitle: A digital history project
imagebackground.text: This project focus on the history and place memories of Mechanicsville, a once working-class neighbourhood in Ottawa currently in the throes of gentrification.
